data: Intravenous therapy may be initiated when there is:  severe anemia with hemoglobin less than 110 g/L AND [ferritin less than 30 mcg/L OR transferrin saturation less than 20%]  AND  failure of oral iron therapy trial OR intolerance to oral iron therapy  AND  inadequate iron absorption OR  continued blood loss OR  urgent surgery in an iron-deficient patient/pre-operative indication OR  chronic kidney disease
Test dose is not required for iron sucrose
300 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
300 mg, IV, q24h, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: inj
Select or modify the medications within Hypersensitivity / Anaphylaxis Module as required
